bibl.title: Would You Name Your Child after a Celebrity? Arsinoe, Berenike, Kleopatra, Laodike and Stratonike in the Greco-Roman East.
bibl.note: Royal names. - The data. - Mapping queens' names in space and time. - From nobles to slaves: the social evolution of dynastic names. - Conclusion. - P. 362: Appendix: Arsinoos and Kleopatros.
